name: Fly Swatter (One Hour Game Jam 67)
description:
Swat flies. Lots of them. Before the timer runs out!

This is a little fly swatting game inspired by the Minigame from Super Mario Paint and made in a hour using Pico-8, for the 67th One Hour Game Jam. If you're interested in how it works, the source code is available.

The theme for this One Hour Game Jam was 'mouse only'.

Instructions

  • Move the swatter using your mouse.
  • Click to swat!
  • Try to get the highest score possible!
